Backstory: BitMain has used their patents to sue others. They allegedly were using AsicBoost covertly to mine Bitcoin and that's why they were so against SegWit. SegWit blocks covert but not overt AsicBoost boost. AsicBoost gives about a 15% power savings, which is huge. 1/

This news went under the radar recently, but I want to highlight this as a HUGE (YUGE!) development in decentralization of Bitcoin mining. Any miner manufacturer that wants to use AsicBoost will need to join BDPL and open up their patents! Well it's a good thing that they can't shut it down. It's astonishing that you think that corporations paying employees in cryptocurrency directly would suddenly stop paying taxes. I get paid in BTC, I pay my taxes. What difference does the currency make?

Those who want to shutdown crypto don't need talking points. Totalitarian financial surveillance doesn't stop tax cheats. The tax cheats end up running the surveillance state and use it to advance their interests.
